projects.title: Eon Motors
projects.description: A headless ecommerce website for a fictional company, built using Shopify's Storefront api, GraphQL, and NextJS.

projects.title: Nooks & Crannies
projects.description: Nooks & Crannies is a house cleaning service in Dubai. The website is built using NextJS' static export feature, resulting in a fast and responsive experience.

projects.title: Discourse
projects.description: A prototype React chat application featuring real time communication using NodeJS and SocketIO.
